sections.title: Fingerprint reader
sections.content: The fingerprint reader is not currently supported by libfprint link. Install libfprint-fpcmoh-gitAUR to add the proprietary Lenovo driver to libfprint.

sections.title: Function keys
sections.content:
Both the function lock and Fn+F1 (XF86AudioMute) have indicator lights.

Table content:
Key | Visible?1 | Marked?2 | Effect
Fn | Yes | No | XF86WakeUp
Fn+F1 | Yes | Yes | XF86AudioMute
Fn+F2 | Yes | Yes | XF86AudioLowerVolume
Fn+F3 | Yes | Yes | XF86AudioRaiseVolume
Fn+F4 | Yes | Yes | XF86AudioMicMute
Fn+F5 | Yes | Yes | XF86MonBrightnessDown
Fn+F6 | Yes | Yes | XF86MonBrightnessUp
Fn+F7 | Yes | Yes | XF86Display
Fn+F8 | Yes | Yes | XF86WLAN
Fn+F9 | Yes | Yes | XF86NotificationCenter
Fn+F10 | Yes | Yes | XF86PickupPhone
Fn+F11 | Yes | Yes | XF86HangupPhone
Fn+F12 | Yes | Yes | XF86Favorites
Fn+Escape | No | Yes | Function lock

1. The key is visible to xev and similar tools.
1. The physical key has a symbol on it, which describes its function.
